front.title: Guidelines and Registration Procedures for Interface Types and Tunnel Types

abstract.t: This document provides guidelines and procedures for those who aredefining, registering, or evaluating definitions of new interfacetypes ("ifType" values) and tunnel types. The original definition ofthe IANA interface type registry predated the use of IANAConsiderations sections and YANG modules, so some confusion aroseover time. Tunnel types were added later, with the same requirementsand allocation policy as interface types. This document updates RFC2863 and provides updated guidance for these registries.
